description: An issue was discovered on Samsung mobile devices with P(9.0) (Exynos chipsets) software. Kernel Wi-Fi drivers allow out-of-bounds Read or Write operations (e.g., a buffer overflow). The Samsung IDs are SVE-2019-16125, SVE-2019-16134, SVE-2019-16158, SVE-2019-16159, SVE-2019-16319, SVE-2019-16320, SVE-2019-16337, SVE-2019-16464, SVE-2019-16465, SVE-2019-16467 (March 2020).
